mapper.select: SELECT Title FROM Ideas WHERE IdeaID = #{ideaId}
SELECT io.*, u.UserName FROM IdeaOpinions io JOIN Users u ON io.UserID = u.UserID WHERE io.HatColor = #{hatColor} AND io.IsDelete = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IdeaOpinions (IdeaID, UserID, ParentOpinionID, OpinionText, HatColor, LikeNum, IsDelete, CreatedAt) VALUES (#{ideaID}, #{userID}, #{parentOpinionID}, #{opinionText}, #{hatColor}, #{likeNum}, #{isDelete}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE IdeaOpinions SET IsDelete = true WHERE OpinionID = #{notificationID}
